channel.title: How would i make npcs use magic and range
channel.description: ive been told before to make an npc use magic an range, i need to make the animation go from a distance to the player, then add damage. How would i do this??? [br][size=1]Posted on: February 21, 2007, 06:27:41 PM[/size][hr]nobody is that smart???[br][size=1]Posted on: February 21, 2007, 07:40:43 PM[/size][hr]nevermind! all i need to know is how to make , for example, a air strike go from the caster to the enemy.

item.description:

cheezscape,

but now what i need is to find where it says how npcs attack.
